name: Star Runner (itch) (CharlieD_Dev)
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam 97

All Assets Except The Font Were Made During The Jam

This Game Was Also Made In Java Script Using Processing. It Was My First Time Not Using A Game Engine To Make A Game.

For The Music I Used Bosca Ceoil And For Sound Effects I Used Audacity

How To Play:

WASD - Move Around

Avoid the stars and make it as far as you can

If you hit a star you will be bounced back and loose points

*tip take your time
